results.title: Simvastatin attenuates axonal injury after experimental traumatic brain injury and promotes neurite outgrowth of primary cortical neurons.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Basal_Ganglia_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001480 @@@axonal injury@@@ after experimental @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@traumatic brain injury@@@ and promotes neurite outgrowth of primary cortical neurons.

results.title: Combination treatment of experimental stroke with Niaspan and Simvastatin, reduces axonal damage and improves functional outcome.
results.text_hl: Combination treatment of experimental @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@Niaspan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, reduces @<m>DISEASE_Basal_Ganglia_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001480 @@@axonal damage@@@ and improves functional outcome.

results.title: Reduction of ischemic brain injury in rats with normothermic and hyperthermic conditions.
results.text_hl: They then studied whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could reduce the @<m>DISEASE_Basal_Ganglia_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001480 @@@perfusion@@@ deficits, damage to the blood-brain barrier (BBB), and degeneration of neurons in the @DISEASE_Brain_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D020520 @@@ischemic injured brain@@@.

results.title: Synergistic benefits of erythropoietin and simvastatin after traumatic brain injury.
results.text_hl: Results showed that compared to baseline @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@, rhEpo was more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in promoting cell proliferation while @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was more effective than rhEpo in restoring @<m>DISEASE_Basal_Ganglia_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001480 @@@axonal damage@@@ following @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@.

citations.NLM: Chauhan NB, Gatto R. Synergistic benefits of erythropoietin and simvastatin after traumatic brain injury. Brain Res. 2010 Nov 11;1360():177-92. PMID: 20833152
